description: Students work intensively on a special topic in mathematics. Topics vary from year to year. May be repeated if topic is different. Offered annually.
name: Sem: Cryptography
notes: Prerequisite: MATH 239, MATH 252, CSCI 353, or permission of instructor.
prerequisites: MATH 239, MATH 252, CSCI 353, or permission of instructor.
title: Topics in Mathematics
